heroes.name: npc_dota_hero_keeper_of_the_light
heroes.bio_loc: Upon a pale horse he rides, this spark of endless suns, this Keeper of the Light.  Ezalor long ago escaped the Fundamental plane, separating from the other ancient forces to which he was bound within the great Primordial harmony.  He is a power grown sentient in the dawn of the universe, and now rides forth in all planes at once, one step ahead of pursuing chaos, bearing his gift with him at the end of a radiant staff.  His majestic truth lies hidden beneath the outward appearance of a slightly doddering old man who barely stays in the saddle.  However, when faced with the challenge of chaos, or the forces of darkness, his primordial light bursts forth, and his full power is revealed, transforming him once again into a force to be reckoned with.
heroes.hype_loc: Keeper of the Light is a helpful addition to any team. Manipulating the mana of both his allies and enemies, he effortlessly destroys lesser foes with waves of illumination, then enters his spirit form to gather his team to press the assault.

facets.description_loc: Grants the Solar Bind ability while active.
facets.name: keeper_of_the_light_facet_solar_bind

abilities.name: keeper_of_the_light_illuminate
abilities.desc_loc: CHANNELED - Channels light energy, building power the longer it's channeled.  Once released, a wave is sent forth that deals damage and gives vision in its path.  The longer it is channeled, the more damage is dealt.
abilities.lore_loc: Ezalor's hidden light reveals itself in marvelous fashion.
notes_loc: Gives increasing vision over the channeling time.

abilities.name: keeper_of_the_light_blinding_light
abilities.desc_loc: A blinding light flashes over the targeted area, knocking back and blinding the units in the area, causing them to miss some attacks. Knockback is %knockback_distance% range over %knockback_duration% seconds.
abilities.lore_loc: The Primordial light turns the tides of battle in favor of Ezalor and his allies.
notes_loc: Upon landing, units will destroy trees in a 150 radius.

abilities.name: keeper_of_the_light_chakra_magic
abilities.desc_loc: Restores mana to the target unit and reduces cooldowns of all basic abilities currently on cooldown by a fixed amount. Is %self_bonus%%% more effective when used on himself.
abilities.lore_loc: In the same vein, Ezalor bestows his harmony among others.
notes_loc: Chakra Magic does not reduce the cooldown of Ultimate abilities

abilities.name: keeper_of_the_light_will_o_wisp
abilities.desc_loc: Summons Ignis Fatuus at the targeted area. Alternates on and off, drawing enemies closer with its mesmerising flicker.
abilities.lore_loc: Though he would not claim to 'know' them, Ezalor holds an uncanny influence over many powerful creatures always willing to come to his aid.
notes_loc: Ignus Fatuus applies a non-interrupting pull towards it on all enemies within the radius.

abilities.name: keeper_of_the_light_spirit_form
abilities.desc_loc: Ezalor temporarily turns his body luminescent, gaining bonus movement speed, cast range, and allows Illuminate to be channeled by a separate spirit and heal allies.
abilities.lore_loc: In a flash of light, Ezalor reveals his true nature.
facets_loc: Grants the Solar Bind ability while active.
Grants the Recall ability while active.

abilities.name: keeper_of_the_light_mana_magnifier
abilities.desc_loc: Allies within %aura_radius% range of Keeper of the Light have %bonus_mana_pct%%% more mana. Lingers for 5 seconds.

abilities.name: keeper_of_the_light_radiant_bind
abilities.desc_loc: Weakens an enemy's magical resistance, and applies a slow that increases in strength the more the target moves.

abilities.name: keeper_of_the_light_recall
abilities.desc_loc:
After a short delay, teleports the targeted friendly hero to your location. If the targeted friendly hero takes player based damage during this time, the ability is interrupted. When cast, the teleport target's movement speed is increased. Upon teleporting, Chakra Magic and the increased movement speed buff are applied to both Keeper of the Light and the teleport target.

If alt-cast, teleports Keeper of the Light to the target Ally instead.

Ability Level increases with levels of Spirit Form.
notes_loc: If Keeper of the Light dies, the spell effect is interrupted.
You can disable help to prevent Keeper from casting this spell on you.
Can be cast through the minimap, choosing the nearest friendly hero.
